    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vodni mlinček - priprava</string>
            <string language="en">Water mill - preparations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wassertausendstel - Vorbereitungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Moulin à eau - préparations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moinho de água - preparações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laminatoio di acqua - preparazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υδρόμυλος - προετοιμασίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Molino de agua - preparaciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Pred vami je podrobna priprava na vzgojno - izobraževalno delo. Vezana je na učno uro, tehniški dan v tretjem razredu, pri kateri izdelujemo vodni mlinček.</string>
            <string language="en">How to organize the making of water mill and how to explain the theory behind it.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vodni mlin</string>
            <string language="en">water mill</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">tehnika</string>
            <string language="en">technique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">izdelava</string>
            <string language="en">creating</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man das Bilden des Wassertausendstels 
organisiert und wie man die Theorie hinter ihr erklärt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment organiser la fabrication du moulin à eau
et comment expliquer la théorie derrière elle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como organizar fazer do moinho de água e como 
explicar a teoria atrás dela.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come organizzare fare del laminatoio di acqua e 
come spiegarle la teoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να οργανώσει την παραγωγή του υδρομύλου και πώς 
να εξηγήσει τη θεωρία πίσω από το.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo ordenar la fabricación del molino de agua 
y cómo explicar la teoría detrás de ella.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wassertausendstel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erstellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">moulin à eau</string>
